name: right
description: Return the substring that extracts 'length' chars from 'str' starting from the right.

params.name: string
params.description: The string from which to returns a substring.

params.name: length
params.description: The number of characters to return.

params.name: string
params.description: The string from which to returns a substring.

params.name: length
params.description: The number of characters to return.

examples:
FROM employees
| KEEP last_name
| EVAL right = RIGHT(last_name, 3)
| SORT last_name ASC
| LIMIT 5
